title: Flexi PM – Your Freelance Project Manager
subtitle: Experience. Expertise. Results.
name: Pascal Marty (Flexi PM)
job-title: Senior Project Manager | IPMA Level C, PMI-PMP®
profile-text-1: I am a certified senior project manager (IPMA Level C, PMI-PMP®) with over 20 years of experience managing international projects in the automotive, semiconductor, energy, and telecommunications sectors.
profile-text-2: My expertise lies in industrialization, compliance (ASPICE, ISO 26262, VDE, AQG324) and cost optimization (Design-to-Cost). I support you in the timely and budget-compliant implementation of your projects, from concept to production.
skill-1:
✅ End-to-End Project Responsibility
Quality, cost, deadlines (QCD) – from concept to production.
skill-2:
✅ Risk Management & Crisis Resolution
FMEA, 8D reports, global project management.
skill-3:
✅ Leadership of Intercultural Teams
Up to 50+ team members, stakeholder communication at all levels.
skill-4:
✅ Proven Successes
On-time market launch, budget compliance (> €20M), > 95% audit success rate (e.g., VDA 6.3).
why-me-text: With my long-standing experience in managing complex projects and my international expertise, here’s what I bring to the table:
why-me-item-1: Active Listening: Understanding your challenges and constraints before taking action.
why-me-item-2: Quick and Smooth Integration into your team, based on my extensive experience across various sectors.
why-me-item-3: Commitment to Results: Quality, deadlines, and cost control.
why-me-item-4: Multilingual Communication: Fluent in French and German (native level), professional English for seamless international collaboration.
